name: grapejuice
label: gameplay overhaul, increased realism, New maps, New Skirmish Randomization, Total Rebalance, New unit mechanics, New particles, New Building, New Tech
description: A gameplay overhaul mod that aims to increase realism. Units can charge attack, can get wounded, ranged units require and use ammo, various units have secondary weapons and every single unit has been rebalanced, even per rank. Also includes new maps, player position randomnization for skirmish maps, and more.
